name: Noobtuts Pacman
description: This is a simple pacman clone that I made by following a tutorial on noobtuts.com.  Use arrow keys to move.  Theres only one ghost which has a pre-programmed path around the maze and if you know what it is you might be able to avoid the ghost and collect all of the dots.  If you follow this tutorial with Unity 5.0.0f4 you will get something like this simple pacman clone too.    Good luck!
